name: get_gifs_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool giphy.
Tool description: Giphy is an animated GIF search engine.

The Giphy API implements a REST-like interface. Connections can be made with any HTTP enabled programming language. The Giphy API also implements CORS, allowing you to connect to Giphy from JavaScript / Web browsers on your own domain.
API description: A multiget version of the get GIF by ID endpoint. In this case the IDs are feqkVgjJpYtjy and 7rzbxdu0ZEXLy

ids.description: A comma-separated string of GIF IDs.
